snippet: President Obama has imposed sanctions on the Central African Republic’s former president, François Bozizé, and four other men linked to violence and human rights abuses.
abstract: Pres Obama imposes sanctions on Francois Bozize, former president of the Central African Republic, and four other men linked to violence and human rights abuses in the country; sanctions, which freeze assets and ban travel, follow United Nations Security Council sanctions on Bozize.
lead_paragraph: President Obama has imposed sanctions on the Central African Republic’s former president, François Bozizé, and four other men linked to violence and human rights abuses.

headline.main: Central African Republic: U.S. Sanctions for Former Leader
headline.print_headline: Central African Republic: Sanctions for Former Leader

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
